plot: A couple has breakfast. Their movements reflect each other - where his begin, hers end. They are on the same wavelength. But, a simple gesture, with wrong timing, turns their breakfast into disaster.
title: Kava sa dzemom
plot_es: A couple has breakfast. Their movements reflect each other - where his begin, hers end. They are on the same wavelength. But, a simple gesture, with wrong timing, turns their breakfast into disaster.
plot_en: A couple has breakfast. Their movements reflect each other - where his begin, hers end. They are on the same wavelength. But, a simple gesture, with wrong timing, turns their breakfast into disaster.
